channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge recuses himself in Arizona fake elector case after email surfaces
item.description: A judge recused himself Tuesday from presiding over Arizona's fake electors case after an email surfaced in which he told fellow judges to speak out a...

item.title: Trump Faces Catch-22 in Manhattan Case
item.description: He has a good chance of getting the case reversed on appeal — but he can’t appeal until after Judge Merchan sentences him.

item.title: House Republicans to elect new Trump-era leadership with majority still undecided
item.description: House Republicans are picking which leaders will represent them in the new Trump administration government next year.

item.title: Pennsylvania Democrats Keep State House Majority By Aligning With Trump And Using Billionaire Funds
item.description: Local voters may not think of a rural state House race as a target for out-of-state leftist billionaires, but financial reports reveal how Democrats m...

item.title: Republican Rep. David Valadao wins reelection in heavily Democratic California district
item.description: Republican Rep. David Valadao has won reelection in California's 22nd Congressional District, defeating Democrat Rudy Salas for the second time.

item.title: Republicans Look To Reshape State Goverments After Major 2024 Victories
item.description: Republicans scored significant wins in state legislative races last week imperative to implementing a conservative agenda.

item.title: Texas lawmakers file record breaking 1,500 bills for 2025 legislative session
item.description: Texas lawmakers began filing bills for next year’s legislative session on Tuesday, submitting a record-breaking 1,500 in the first filing period.

item.title: Trump appoints Musk, Ramaswamy to lead Department of Government Efficiency
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Tuesday announced that Tesla founder Elon Musk and businessman Vivek Ramaswamy will lead a new Department of Governmen...

item.title: Students Lose, Teachers’ Unions Win in Massachusetts Election
item.description: The state’s vote to abolish its high-school exit exam keeps us from knowing how well they’re educating students — which is just how teachers’ unions l...

item.title: Speaker Johnson could face challenger amid simmering GOP discontent
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson is seeking a smooth reelection to another term wielding the gavel, but a small group of discontent conservatives are again ...

item.title: Kristi Noem Isn’t Courageous Enough To Be Trump’s Homeland Security Secretary
item.description: While Noem is certainly skilled at promoting herself, she doesn't have the courage required for this role.

item.title: FEMA Employee Fired For Bypassing Homes With Trump Signs Says She Was Following Agency Protocol
item.description: Ex-FEMA supervisor indicates bypassing Trump supporters based on their perceived hostility is a widespread occurrence.

item.title: Fracking Is Key in the Keystone State — in 2024 and Beyond
item.description: It has fundamentally transformed the United States, and it influenced this election cycle.

item.title: Reports Show Nefarious Reality Behind Canada’s Assisted Suicide Program
item.description: Reports show that in Ontario alone there were 428 possible criminal cases related to Canada's assisted suicide program since 2018.

item.title: Republicans to huddle behind close doors to elect McConnell's successor Wednesday
item.description: The incoming Senate Republican Conference will meet Wednesday morning to elect the successor of Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, R-Ky.

item.title: Report: NFL intentionally delayed fine for 49ers' Nick Bosa until after election
item.description: According to a report Tuesday, the league deliberately decided not to impose an immediate fine on San Francisco 49ers defensive end Nick Bosa for wear...

item.title: Trump, defying media predictions, mainly picks seasoned Capitol Hill veterans such as Marco Rubio
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has gone against media expectations by tapping Marco Rubio, Kristi Noem and a number of other Capitol Hill veterans to fi...

item.title: It’s Time for Bob Casey Jr. to Concede to Reality
item.description: The Pennsylvania Senate race is over.

item.title: Trump Might Not Lead a U.S. Retreat from the World Stage After All
item.description: His early personnel choices indicate his incoming administration would be willing to use sticks as well as carrots to deal with Russia.

item.title: Biden-Trump White House meeting revives presidential tradition skipped 4 years ago
